com.rscja.scanner.utility

Class ScannerUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rscja.scanner.utility.ScannerUtility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScanner

    public class ScannerUtility
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScanner
    键盘助手工具类，用于控制键盘助手
    keyboardemulator tool-kits, control keyboardemulator
    Author:
    Administrator

    • Field Summary

      • setScanKey

        public void setScanKey(Context context,
                       int type,
                       int[] scanKey)
        Description copied from interface: IScanner
        设置扫描或者读卡的按键值
        Setup keycode for barcode scan or card reading
        Specified by:
        setScanKey in interface IScanner
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        type - 0: Barcode 1：RFID 2：LF 3：UHF
        scanKey - 按键值,条码和UHF支持两个按键值，其他的只支持一个按键值(scanKey keycode, barcode and UHF support two keycodes, others support one keycode.)

        mode - 0:epc、 1:tid

      • setBarcodeContinuousMode

                                     int mode)

        设置扫描头连续扫描模式 (备注：键盘助手v2.3.5 之后的版本才支持)

        context - Context
